wikipedia_page.main: Kelly Louise Hackman (born 10 December 1980) is a British gymnast. She competed for Great Britain at the 2000 Summer Olympics in Sydney, Australia.

link_mentions.page: Great Britain at the 2000 Summer Olympics
response: Lisa Mason, Annika Reeder, Emma Williams, Sharna Murray, Kelly Hackman & Paula Thomas represented Great Britain. The Team placed 10th which was the highest placing attained by GBR Women's Artistic Gymnastics at an Olympic Games.
|Kelly Hackman                             ||team, all-around, beam, floor, uneven bars ||1 x silver
